objects.text:
• Spinning palm tree & leaf bed
• Relaxing hammock for two kitties
• Includes food bowls & toys

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This banner features a vibrant and playful design created for a children’s toy advertisement. It uses a vertically split background with a diagonal gradient: the left half blends cheerful pink hues, while the right half mixes mint green tones, giving a fresh and energetic feel. The left section showcases multiple text layers: a bold title ("heading"), a slightly smaller subheading ("subheading"), a detailed feature list ("description"), a large price ("price"), and a clear call-to-action ("cta") within a white rectangular button ("cta_background"). The right section features a colorful and detailed toy image ("product_image") to draw visual interest.

**Color Palette:**
- Pink Gradient: `#FF9AC8` to `#FF6BB3`
- Green Gradient: `#7EFFA8` to `#58D982`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Pink (CTA text): `#FF6BB3`
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette ideal for children's toys. Key colors include hot pink (#F74CA1) for the top structure, mint green (#40C89C) for grassy textures and leaves, and tan beige (#F2C295) for the base and support structures. Secondary highlights include sky blue (#58C4DD) for the hammock and bowls, lavender purple (#C39BD3) for accent pieces, and vivid red-pink (#F23A69) for small accessories. These bright, saturated hues are well-blended to evoke a whimsical, tropical theme, yet the contrast between them ensures each element stands out. The cohesive blending of playful tones makes the scene inviting and imaginative.
